name: ProjectCrawl_7DRL
description:
7DRL_2022 entry.

Instructions

Controls

    Movement - Keypad 1-9

    Wait - Keypad 5

    Skills and their hotkeys are displayed next to your health and mana bars

    Enter - Confirms skill usage

There is no basic attack through movement, the Strike skill[Q] is for this but does cost a little bit of mana.

To level up skills press and hold LEFT SHIFT then the skill hotkey you want to level up.

All units regenerate health and mana each turn so choose when to wait and which skill to use.

Skill points are earned per floor clear.

There are only 3 skill points you can earn in total and each skill maxes out at level 3. Choose wisely!

If your not able to cast a skill, you don't have enough mana. Wait a few turns to regenerate and then see if you have enough mana

You have 10 floors to clear. Good luck!
